Name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
Title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
Descriptino: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

Name: DataAbsentReason
Title: DataAbsentReason
Descriptino: Used to specify why the normally expected content of the data element is missing.

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: LOINCCodes
Title: LOINC Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all LOINC codes

Name: ObservationInterpretationCodes
Title: Observation Interpretation Codes
Descriptino: A categorical assessment, providing a rough qualitative interpretation of the observation value,    such as “normal”/ “abnormal”,”low” / “high”, “better” / “worse”, “susceptible” / “resistant”, “expected”/ “not expected”.    The value set is intended to be for ANY use where coded representation of an interpretation is needed.             Notes:          This is being communicated in v2.x in OBX-8 (Observation Interpretation), in v3 in ObservationInterpretation (CWE) in R1 (Representative Realm) and in FHIR in    Observation.interpretation. Historically these values come from the laboratory domain, and these codes are extensively    used. The value set binding is extensible, so codes outside the value set that are needed for interpretation concepts    (i.e. particular meanings) that are not included in the value set can be used, and these new codes may also be added to    the value set and published in a future version.

Name: ObservationMethods
Title: Observation Methods
Descriptino: Observation Method codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 272394005 (Technique (qualifier value)) or is-a 129264002 (Action (qualifier value)) or is-a 386053000 (Evaluation procedure(procedure))

Name: ObservationStatus
Title: ObservationStatus
Descriptino: Codes providing the status of an observation.

Name: ObservationReferenceRangeAppliesToCodes
Title: Observation Reference Range Applies To Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the particular target population the reference range applies to.

Name: ObservationReferenceRangeMeaningCodes
Title: Observation Reference Range Meaning Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the meaning/use of a reference range for a particular target population.

Name: USCoreSimpleObservationCategory
Title: US Core Simple Observation Category
Descriptino: Used to classify the context of a survey, screening or assessment for simple observations and may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate instances.

Name: GoalBarrierCodes
Title: Goal Barrier Assessment Codes
Descriptino: Terminology codes for goal barrier assessment

Name: PPCBothersomeHealthConcerns
Title: Bothersome Health Concerns
Descriptino: Value set containing types of bothersome symptoms or health concerns.

Name: PPCCareTradeOff
Title: Care Trade-off
Descriptino: Value set containing types of care trade-off.

Name: PPCWhatMatters
Title: PPC What Matters ValueSet
Descriptino: Vlue set containing types of What Matters.
